description: Canonical manifest for all governed AI system prompts

domain-02-analysis.name: Analysis & Decision Making
domain-02-analysis.scope: Data analysis, critical thinking, problem-solving, and decision support

domain-03-project-management.name: Project Management & Planning
domain-03-project-management.scope: Planning, organizing, scheduling, tracking, and coordinating projects

domain-04-marketing.name: Marketing & Growth
domain-04-marketing.scope: Market positioning, customer acquisition, brand development, growth tactics

domain-05-product.name: Product & Services
domain-05-product.scope: Product vision, feature definition, UX design, product strategy

domain-06-education.name: Education & Learning
domain-06-education.scope: Curriculum design, instructional methods, learning experiences

domain-07-personal.name: Personal Development & Productivity
domain-07-personal.scope: Individual growth, habit formation, time management, goal-setting

domain-08-business.name: Business & Strategy
domain-08-business.scope: Business models, competitive strategy, organizational planning

domain-09-technical.name: Technical & System Thinking
domain-09-technical.scope: Technical architecture, system design, engineering practices

domain-10-communication.name: Communication & Presentation
domain-10-communication.scope: Effective communication, presentation design, public speaking, message delivery

product-thinker.name: Product Thinker
product-thinker.purpose: Data-informed, technically-feasible product strategy and design

growth-operator.name: Growth Operator
growth-operator.purpose: Data-driven growth strategy with effective execution

learning-designer.name: Learning Designer
learning-designer.purpose: Effective, engaging, and measurable educational experiences
